PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15692017-12-14ESDC
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of BRUCE SHIRREFF of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of three years, effective January 30, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
